CustomField.description: Incident severity in order to classify the
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
1 - Critical - Entire system or business process is unusable or does not meet the needs of the business, many users affected and no workaround is available.
2 - High - Part of the system or key business process is unusable or does not meet the needs of the business, few users affected and/or a workaround is available.
3 - Medium - A non-critical incident occurs typically affecting few users. The incident affects the ability to provide the best service but there is a workaround.
CustomField.label: Severity
